description: Welcome to our beauty salon which is based right in the heart of Canterbury. This is the place to be if you want to get away from it all and unwind...
name: Elite Beauty

description: The Antoniou Hair Group has been in business for over 40 years. We are an established and professional company. We invest in innovative people to make you look good and feel fantastic by creating the looks you want. Our teams of hair stylists and beauty therapists share a passion for customer service. Cutting and colouring is the foundation of great hairdressing, each enhancing the effect of the other. We focus on making it individual and personalised for you. We are always pleased to welcome you for a free hair consultation. Our beauty salons in Ashford and Canterbury offer you relaxation, peace and tranquillity as well as a comprehensive range of beauty treatments.
name: Antoniou Hair & Beauty

description: Founded in 1895 in Austria, Swarovski designs, creates and markets high-quality crystal product collections such as jewellery, accessories, decorative items for the home, ornaments and figurines. Swarovski has a global reach and showcases its sparkling crystal products via a network of own boutiques and retail partners, as well as the Swarovski website and Online Shops. Swarovski crystal makes for an exceptional gift. Naturally brilliant, the fashionable silver-tone necklaces, bracelets and earrings have proven most successful. True eye-catchers, the cocktail rings are commanding pieces of impeccable craftsmanship. Swarovski jewellery truly boosts creative self expression. From timeless daywear to the bold, glamorous and fashionable jewellery and evening bags, Swarovski launches new collections on a quarterly basis, offering something for every need and taste.
name: Swarovski

description: At The Money Shop we offer a range of services. Whether you’re looking to pick up some travel money or you’d like to sell some gold – we’ve got it covered.
name: The Money Shop

description: Making simple vegetarian and vegan food special is our passion, and it’s easy when we use the best local, organic and fair trade produce available. We cook delicious breakfasts and lunches on the premises every day. We also provide excellent teas, coffees and an exceptional range of homemade cakes. Everything is readily available to take away in our handy compostable boxes.
name: The Veg Box Cafe

description: Coast is one of the top UK destinations to buy luxury, glamorous clothing designed for your every special occasion, offering a large collection of stunningly designed pieces ideal for creating ensembles that have an effortless elegance. From sophisticated maxi dresses, simply stylish tops and cover ups to on trend jumpsuits, trousers and accessories, Coast will have an outfit for every occasion.
name: Coast

description: Samsonite is the worldwide leader in superior travel bags, luggage, and accessories combining notable style with the latest design technology and the utmost attention to quality and durability. For more than 100 years, Samsonite has leveraged its rich design heritage to create unparalleled products that fulfill the on-the-go lifestyle needs of the business professional.
name: Samsonite

description: Our sandwiches, salads and baguettes are made fresh every day, using natural ingredients which get dropped off to each shop before dawn. We don’t have a huge factory. Our food is freshly made throughout the day in each and every Pret kitchen.
name: Pret A Manger

description: At Westgate Barbers, we offer a full range of male grooming services including our relaxing hot towel shaves. Staying true to the roots of vintage barbering, we use techniques that have been passed down through many generations to deliver award winning haircuts. Our team brings with them a wealth of experience and professionalism, making Westgate Barbers the quintessential place for the discerning gentleman.
name: Westgate Barber Shop

description: Apple, Microsoft & Samsung Repair, Buy & Sell Canterbury
name: Apple Tree Canterbury

description: A 17th Century Pub in the heart of Canterbury, serving some of the finest local ales and traditional home-cooked food. Our garden is known as ‘one of the best kept secrets in Canterbury’ so maybe it’s time to come and see for yourself! Our focus is on making sure our beer is well kept and our staff are always smiling.
name: The Unicorn Inn

description: The Old Weavers House is a very popular restaurant in the middle of Canterbury. For years we have been producing traditional Engline roasts and our own puff pastry pies, along with tender fillet steaks. Here at the Weavers, we believe in high quality service and good food. Our lunch time specials are served between 11 and 5 and offer fantastic value for money. Our traditional English roasts are served every day throughout the day. As well as the historic building that hte Old Weavers Restaurant is set in, we also have a beautiful riverside garden that tops any other outside dining experience in the whole of Canterbury.
name: The Old Weavers House

description: Bespoke Fine Jewellery. Designed and Traditionally Handmade in Canterbury

description: Situated in the heart of Canterbury we are a friendly family run business and have been an established pawnbrokers for over twenty years. Our staff are professional in all aspects of thier work, approachable and most importantly discreet because your business is our business but nobody else's. Pre-owned watches and jewellery are our speciality.
name: Canterbury Pawnbrokers

description: Whistles is a contemporary fashion brand, based in London. Led by inspiring CEO Jane Shepherdson, Whistles encapsulates an intelligent sense of design with timeless and luxurious pieces. Collections are modern and laid back with an attention to detail and quality. Since its relaunch in 2008, Whistles has become a wardrobe staple for fashion editors and industry leaders, characterised by its contemporary and effortless style.
name: Whistles

description: Founded over 40 years ago by Cyrus Harvey, Crabtree & Evelyn has evolved since 1972 from a small, family-run business specialising in fine soap from around the world, to an international company with over 500 stores worldwide.

description: We are a friendly Fair Trade shop and wholesaler, dealing in unusual and interestinggifts, musical instruments and clothing from around the world. We are a proud member of BAFTS, The British Association of Fair Trade Shops and Suppliers. We have a fantastic and eclectic customer base that includes festival traders and goers, sound therapists, music shops and musicians, clothes stores and their dedicated followers of fashion, Buddhist centres, zoos and museums to name just a few.

description: We specialise in pasties hand made in West Cornwall everyday but we'll take care of breakfast, lunch, snacks, hot drinks, cold drinks, time fillers, drinks and dinner.
